### Running the R Markdown Notebook
In order to the run the walkthrough, it is highly recommend to install and use RStudio.
Since the walkthrough is an R Markdown document, the `rmarkdown` and `knitr` packages are needed to run the walkthrough and can be installed with the following commands
```{r eval = FALSE}
install.packages("rmarkdown")
install.package("knitr")
```



### Data

The data file `clc317479-file001.csv` can be found can be found in the zip file in the supplementary file found here: `https://academic.oup.com/clinchem/article/66/9/1210/5900235`.
